channel.title: Upcoming OECD Publication Embargoes and Launches
channel.description: A list of dates and publications

item.title: Objectives and challenges in the implementation of a universal pension system in France
item.description: Objectives and challenges in the implementation of a universal pension system in France by Economics Department has an embargo on Friday 24 May 2019 at 2:00.
item.oe:directorate: Economics Department

item.title: Increasing the benefits of Slovakia’s integration in global value chains
item.description: Increasing the benefits of Slovakia’s integration in global value chains by Economics Department has an embargo on Friday 24 May 2019 at 2:00.
item.oe:directorate: Economics Department

item.title: OECD Development Co-operation Peer Reviews: Norway 2019

item.title: OECD Economic Surveys: Latvia 2019
item.description: OECD Economic Surveys: Latvia 2019 by Economics Department has an embargo on Wednesday 29 May 2019 at 10:00 and a launch event planned on Wednesday 29 May 2019 at 10:00.
item.oe:directorate: Economics Department

item.title: OECD Investment Policy Reviews: Croatia 2019
item.description: OECD Investment Policy Reviews: Croatia 2019 by Directorate for Financial and Enterprise Affairs has an embargo on Monday 17 June 2019 at 9:00.
